Account - Class in src
Account class stores the necessary information about the user.

Create an account with name
Account(String, String) - Constructor for class src.Account
Create an account with name and timezone
Account(int, String, String) - Constructor for class src.Account
Create an account with name, ID and timezone of the user
Account(Account) - Constructor for class src.Account
Copy constructor
accountLogin() - Method in class src.prompt.ConsolePrompt
Prompts the user to input account name and password.
accountSignUp() - Method in class src.prompt.ConsolePrompt
Prompts the user to input required details for account creation and calls necessary methods to create the account.
activate(String) - Method in class src.prompt.gui.SceneController
Sets the pane represented by the name as the main pane, essentially displaying it on the window
addAccount(Account, String) - Method in class src.DatabaseConn
Adds the details of the user to the account table, generate a unique ID for the user, store a hashed version of the password along with the ID in the login table.
addEvent(Event) - Method in class src.AllEvents
adds an event to the eventList.
addEvent(Event) - Method in class src.DatabaseConn
Add an event to the event table with the necessary details.
addEventOnDate(Event) - Method in class src.prompt.gui.DateButton
